electroSigilAbsorbed: Energy Regenerated if Electro Sigil is Cleared
pickUpElementalOrbParticle: Picked up an Elemental Orb or Particle

description.1: This calculates the combined damage from Razor's normal attacks during his Elemental Burst.
description.2: It simply sums the Companion X-Hit DMG with the corresponding X-Hit DMG of the normal attack which triggers it.
